room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Akron
review: We had a great time in the President’s Bunker... Really tough, but we managed to escape! Our guide Madison was AWESOME!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Akron
review: Did Bunker Room - Madyson was our guide. She was great, friendly, and was full of jokes. Will def come back

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Akron
review: We escaped the President's Bunker with 15 minutes left! It was incredibly difficult, but yet so much fun at the same time!! Our group had a great time working together and trying to solve the puzzles. We will come back and try the other rooms for sure!
